items.description: The Godfather of Doom is back! Joe Hasselvander is a well-known musician and needs no introduction. In this CD he pays tribute to his favourite bands and records 12 amazing tracks of doomed 60/70s hard rockin' classics.
items.label: Black Widow Records

items.description: Twisted and furious Death/Black metal. Imagine a fast-paced, extreme sounding version of Voivod's mid-career albums with an atmosphere similar to last Bloody Sign CD. Killer!
items.label: Necroshrine Records

items.description: Traditional doom metal with creepy female vocals from Madrid. For fans of Pentagram, Witchfinder General or Reino Ermita√±o. Arguably, the best doom album ever recorded in Spain.
items.label: Out of the Past, Vertebrae, Topillo Records

items.description: Finally available the second full-length of these death metal maniacs from Cuenca (Spain). If you like your Death Metal being rooted in the ancient sounds, try this.
items.label: Equinox Discos

items.description: Awesome epic doom metal that will remind you bands like Solstice, (early) While Heaven Wept and the likes. Powerful, ceremonial and very classy.
items.label: I Hate Records

items.description: Interesting band from the minds behind Insulters. Here they play a mix of Black/Death/Rock n roll with some doomy touches.
items.label: Equinox Discos
